Secondhand smoke
If your partner or anyone else 
who lives with you smokes, it 
can	affect	you	and	your	baby	
both before and after birth. You 
may	also	find	it	more	difficult	
to quit. Secondhand smoke 
can cause low birth weight and 
sudden infant death. 
Infants of parents who smoke 
are more likely to be admitted 
to hospital for bronchitis and
